body.name: Hubulk Dog Feeding Mat,100% Waterproof BPA Free Silicone Pet Food and Water Bowl Placemat,Dishwasher, High Raised Edge to Prevent Spills,Nonslip Tray to Stop Messes on Floor (24"x16"x0.5", Grey)

features: Dish Washer Safe and Non-Slip Mat: Prevent pet messes with the Hubulk Waterproof Pet Food Mat with Super raised edges. Protect floors from pet bowls, gravity water dispensers, fountains, and elevated feeders.

100% PREMIUM FOOD GRADE SILICONE - Our dog food mat for food and water is made of 100% premium food-grade silicone. Hypoallergenic, BPA free. No open pores to harbor odor and stain resistant. It’s safety for your dogs or cats or any animals, please rest assured to use. making it the perfect choice for any well-loved pet.

EXTRA-TALL LIP PREVENTS SPILLS: Super high outer lip (0.5” raised edge) keeps all the mess contained on the doggie placemat and away from your floor. Anti skid surface prevents dog bowls from moving. Use this cute waterproof mat under pet food bowls for dogs, water dishes, pet fountains, automatic feeders, feeding stations to protect your floors.

EASY TO CLEAN, DURABLE AND WATERPROOF - Our dog bowl mat is easy to wipe with a wet cloth or wash by hand and it is dishwasher safe. It is dishwasher and microwave safe and can easily fold to be washed in a dishwasher or simply just rinsed down in a sink. If you are traveling or just visiting friends, you can just roll it and take it with you.
10-YEAR MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - If for some reason you find that you are not completely satisfied, then we will happily refund your full purchase price.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hubulk 100% FOOD GRADE SILICONE MAT This flexible, waterproof pet feeding mat will allow your dog or cat to enjoy their food easily and safely anywhere in the house. The mat is designed to prevent spills and messes, and is flexible, waterproof, and easy to clean in the sink or dishwasher. Food grade silicone materials All materials used in the manufacturing of this waterproof pet feeding mat are 100% safe for your pet , so you won't have to worry about any harm coming to your pet as they enjoy their food. Anti-mess design While it is a pet feeding mat, this product has also been designed with owner in mind. The surface of the mat features a bumpy texture to keep food bowls from sliding, slipping, and spilling over. This effect is doubled by the lip edge of the mat (protect floor) , which will prevent food bowls being pushed off the mat. Dishwasher safe and easy-to-clean by hand This dog feeding mat is flexible, waterproof, and easy-to-clean. Simply rinse in the sink with warm soapy water, wipe with a cloth, or place it in the dishwasher as it is 100% dishwasher safe. It's never been easier to provide your pet with a clean, safe eating surface every time they need a meal. Size: Fits almost all kinds of pet 19" x 12" x 0.5" （Fit for Small dogs,1 x 16oz bowls） 24" x 16" x 0.5" （Fit for Small or Medium dogs,2 x 16oz bowls） 28" x 18" x 0.8" （Fit for Medium dogs,2 x 26oz bowls） 32" x 24" x 1.0" （Fit for Large dogs,2 x 40oz bowls /Extra Large Water Bowl） Material: 100% Waterproof BPA Free Food Grade Silicone

Hubulk Super raised edges（0.5" &0.8 " &1" ） will prevent and catch most pet food and water from spilling. 100% waterproof BPA Free Silicone Mat Easy to clean this mat , simply rinse in the sink with warm soapy water, wipe with a cloth, or place it in the dishwasher as it is 100% dishwasher safe.

19" x 12" x 0.5" (48 x 30x 1.25cm)24" x 16" x 0.5" (61 x 40x 1.25cm)28" x 18" x 0.8" (71 x 45x 2.0cm)32" x 24" x 1.0" (81 x 61x 2.5cm) If you're taking your pets with you on vacation, bring your Hubulk Dog Pad!It is convenient for Your pets to eat, and can be folded for storage to save space. No more messy spills.Fit for both dogs and cats.

The Hubulk dog mat durable backing is made of an extra-thick silicone material with a flat surface so that it provides a strong grip with bowls and floors. 0.5" &0.8 " &1" raised edge prevents water from running off the mat and getting onto your floors. Made of high-quality silicone, the Hubulk Mat is dishwasher-safe! No dishwasher, no problem — just wash it off with soap and warm water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hubulk Dog/Cat Silicone Feeding Mat (19"x12"x0.5", Grey)
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Hubulk dog/cat feeding mat is a great product to have for your furry friends. It is designed with a non-slip backing and is easy to clean. The mat is perfect for keeping your floors free of food spills and messes, and its raised edges help to contain any messes that do occur. The mat is also great for keeping your pet's food and water bowls in one place, making it easier for them to eat and drink. The mat is also waterproof and has an anti-microbial surface that helps to prevent bacterial growth. Its neutral colors make it a great addition to any home. Overall, the Hubulk dog/cat feeding mat is an excellent product that is sure to keep your pet's eating and drinking areas clean and tidy.The Hubulk silicone dog/cat feeding mat is 19"X12"X.05" and has a high raised edge to prevent spills. Hubulk feeding mat is a nonslip and waterproof tray to stop messes on the floor. It measures 19"X12"X.05" and allows for pet food and water bowl placement and is dishwasher safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more messes....
reviews.reviewText: I got this to go under our very messy dogs water bowls. Looks nice, well made, easy to clean and does the job perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This thing is nice
reviews.reviewText: This is like something you might pay $20+ for at the pet store. It’s really nice. My cats still move their food to the floor to eat it (they have no brains) but it works well for my cat that likes to take a bath in the water bowl while he eats, which often results in the entire contents of the bowl being spilled onto my kitchen floor. The raised edge of the mat contains spills, keeping post-dinner/bath cleanups to a minimum. I have 4 bowls on this mat and they fit nicely, I’d probably recommend a larger one if you have a large dog or something with several bowls, but my cats just have 1 cup bowls so this works for us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Catches what is spilled
reviews.reviewText: It does what it is designed for but it is small so pay attention to the size. I had to order something bigger to cover the area for the mess my dog makes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is a good weight. It did not arrive curled up from the packaging, it was nice and flat with a good rim at the edge. No nasty smell. It stays in one place and my cat dishes also stay in one place when they are on the mat. It works exactly as it should, it catches her splatters that she makes when she eats her canned food! I have not yet washed it in the dishwasher, I usually just wash it by hand. I was pleasantly surprised at how much we liked it. Much better than our old one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great mat for feeding pets. Wipes off easily and just roll up to store after eating! Very durable. Best may I've bought

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps the floor from getting grimy
reviews.reviewText: Our tile floor was constantly getting yucky and grimy from all the water and food spills. The grout was gross. This solved all the problems. Fits both the water and food bowl. Any spillage stays on the mat and then we just rinse that off without having to scrub the tile under the bowls. Love this product and would recommend to anyone with dogs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works well but awkward to clean
reviews.reviewText: It does a great job of keeping food off the floor, but it shows every speck of food or dust (particularly with the light colors) so it needs washing frequently. It’s awkward to clean in the sink and has to be laid flat to dry. Since I have wood floors I can’t put the mat back down until it’s dry, and the weight and thickness make it tricky to find a place to keep it in between meals. Overall it does what it’s supposed to do but I’d recommend buying a dark color and being sure you have somewhere to keep the wet mat before buying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My dogs have ripped every mat/cover that I have bought so far - this one has been made to withstand those claws - it’s great!
This product does as it says ... and it looks great! Would recommend this product to keep your pet's food and water dishes together, and your floor clean and dry!
Qualitativ hochwertig, sieht gut aus, erfüllt seinen Zweck (Unterlage mit Rand für eine Kaffeemaschine), hoher Rand
Comodissimo grazie al bordino rialzato, così acqua e pezzi di cibo non finisconosul pavimento . Lavabile in un attimo. Ne ho acquistati due e sono pienamente soddisfatta
Ottimo oggetto. Il cibo e l'acqua rimangono sul tappetino e le ciotole non si spostano visto il materiale. Molto soddisfatto.
